mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.yhid AS "yhid", a.zjxm AS "zjxm", a.zjtx AS "zjtx", a.zjjj AS "zjjj", a.zjlxfs AS "zjlxfs", a.zjzw AS "zjzw", a.zjbgs AS "zjbgs", a.szxy AS "szxy", a.szzy AS "szzy", a.zjxx AS "zjxx", a.memo AS "memo", a.zxsj AS "zxsj", a.zjsfkyy AS "zjsfkyy", a.lmbh AS "lmbh", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_zjzx( owid, yhid, zjxm, zjtx, zjjj, zjlxfs, zjzw, zjbgs, szxy, szzy, zjxx, memo, zxsj, zjsfkyy, lmbh, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{yhid}, #{zjxm}, #{zjtx}, #{zjjj}, #{zjlxfs}, #{zjzw}, #{zjbgs}, #{szxy}, #{szzy}, #{zjxx}, #{memo}, #{zxsj}, #{zjsfkyy}, #{lmbh}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE bckj_biz_zjzx SET owid = #{owid}, yhid = #{yhid}, zjxm = #{zjxm}, zjtx = #{zjtx}, zjjj = #{zjjj}, zjlxfs = #{zjlxfs}, zjzw = #{zjzw}, zjbgs = #{zjbgs}, szxy = #{szxy}, szzy = #{szzy}, zjxx = #{zjxx}, memo = #{memo}, zxsj = #{zxsj}, zjsfkyy = #{zjsfkyy}, lmbh = #{lmbh}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}
owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: select from bckj_biz_zjzx a order by a.createtime desc

select a.owid as owid ,b.zjxm as zjxm ,a.xb as xb , a.yh_dlzh as yhDlzh , a.yh_Dlmm as yhDlmm ,b.zjlxfs as zjlxfs, b.zjzw as zjzw, b.szzy as szzy ,b.zjbgs as zjbgs , a.yx as yx ,b.szxy as szxy ,b.exp1 as exp1,b.zjjj as zjjj, b.zjxx as zjxx, b.zjtx as zjtx from bckj_biz_yhxx a ,bckj_biz_zjzx b
a.owid = b.yhid AND a.yhlx=1
and b.zjxm like CONCAT('%',#{zjxm},'%')
and b.szzy like CONCAT('%',#{szzy},'%')
and b.szxy like CONCAT('%',#{szxy},'%')
and b.zjzw like CONCAT('%',#{zjzw},'%')
and b.zjlxfs like CONCAT('%',#{zjlxfs},'%')
order by b.zjxm desc
mapper.update:
update bckj_biz_Zjzx a set
a.zjxm=#{zjxm},
a.zjtx=#{zjtx},
a.zjlxfs=#{zjlxfs},
a.zjzw=#{zjzw},
a.zjbgs=#{zjbgs},
a.szxy=#{szxy},
a.szzy=#{szzy},
a.exp1=#{exp1},
a.zjxx=#{zjxx},
a.zjjj=#{zjjj}
a.yhid = #{yhid}
mapper.select:
select a.owid as owid ,b.zjxm as zjxm ,a.xb as xb , a.yh_dlzh as yhDlzh , a.yh_Dlmm as yhDlmm ,b.zjlxfs as zjlxfs, b.zjzw as zjzw, b.szzy as szzy ,b.zjbgs as zjbgs , a.yx as yx ,b.szxy as szxy ,b.exp1 as exp1 ,b.zjjj as zjjj, b.zjxx as zjxx ,b.zjtx as zjtx from bckj_biz_yhxx a ,bckj_biz_zjzx b
a.owid = b.yhid AND a.yhlx=1 and a.owid =#{owid}
SELECT yh_dlzh from bckj_biz_yhxx where yh_dlzh=#{dlzh}
